body.name: VIVO Ergonomic Cross Legged Chair with Wheels, Home and Office, Versatile Kneeling Chair, Height Adjustable, Yoga Desk Chair, Black, CHAIR-CL02B
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery February 20 - 22. Order within 22 hrs 27 mins.
features: Multifunctional Chair - Change up your sitting position and posture with a versatile cross legged chair. Easily go from cross-legged to kneeling, squatting, and so much more with a 360° swiveling seat with leg rest, encouraging movement throughout your day. Can also be used as a standard office chair. Great for home, office, meditation, and more.

Height Adjustment - Find your ideal ergonomic sitting position with height adjustable seat, featuring an 18.5” to 22” height range. The backrest features tilt and height adjustment for added support, and the leg rest extension can also be adjusted for maximum flexibility.
Mobile Casters - Easily move around your workstation with 5 durable casters designed to accommodate a variety of floor types. Thanks to the sturdy design, this chair can hold up to 220 lbs.

Encourages Movement - Multi-level design allows for active movement throughout your day, allowing you to switch up how you sit. Great for fidgeters and helps to improve concentration and creativity. Thick seat and leg cushions provide active support for every position.
We've Got You Covered - This ergonomic chair is backed with a 1-Year Manufacturer Warranty and friendly tech support to help with any questions or concerns.
body.description: Change up your sitting position throughout the day with Black Cross Legged Chair with Wheels (CHAIR-CL02B) from VIVO! Break free from rigid office chair seating and enjoy all-day flexibility with a versatile yoga desk chair. The multi-level design features a 360-degree swiveling padded seat with leg rest extension, providing ultimate freedom in your sitting posture. Enjoy a variety of positions including cross-legged, kneeling, squatting, and countless others. A multi-function chair keeps your body engaged and improves focus and concentration for fidgeters. Height adjustable seat and leg cushions help you find the right ergonomic height for your needs. Smooth, gliding caster wheels provide effortless movement and mobility across a variety of floor types.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty decent chair
reviews.reviewText: I initially had a few issues with the chair, but after a few simple additions, this chair has been amazing since! I do wish the backrest could be set one more notch further back than the two options you have when assembling the chair.The backrest was a bit uncomfortable to me, so I flipped the way it was installed, with the long side facing down. This way my lower back is better supported and i can rest my elbows on the ends comfortably!I've added a gel seat for comfort since sitting for long periods at a time is difficult with this chair. I've added a headrest as well by clamping it to the top of the back rest and it has been a game changer.All in all, I thought this chair was a win until I modified it to my liking. plus the footrest is sturdy! it hangs by the base of the chair, unlike the competitor that has extra sets of legs with wheels.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s a great chair very comfortable and affordable than the competitor
reviews.reviewText: Love it I have sciatica and it’s very helpful

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Thank you Vivo
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Update 2/9: The replacement bracket arrived and is functional. I applaud Vivo for their outstanding customer service.Update 2/6: The seller contacted me and is sending me a replacement bracket. Hopefully this is just a small manufacturing defect. Their tracking says I should receive the bracket on 2/9 will update after that. Until then I have a stool.On the chair I received either the backrest support bracket is manufactured incorrectly or the screw for it is too short. I think the bracket is manufactured wrong as it only has threads on half of it and it has a lip not visible in the assembly manual. I've reached out to the seller to see if they can get me parts the function. But for now I am left with a chair I cannot really use with comfort. For the price quality control seems like an issue, I will update my review if the seller provides parts to make my chair function properly
